title: Episode #43: A Debate on NSA Surveillance
itunes:title: Episode #43: A Debate on NSA Surveillance
itunes:subtitle: Benjamin Wittes, Steven Vladeck, and Orin Kerr debate NSA surveillance and the Snowden leaks at an event hosted by the George Washington University chapter of the Federalist Society.
description:
Benjamin Wittes, Steven Vladeck, and Orin Kerr debate NSA surveillance and the Snowden leaks at an event hosted by the George Washington University chapter of the Federalist Society.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.
